room_title: Escape room "Fried Chicken" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: This was a really fun experience. The puzzles were challenging without being impossible and the room we did was really neat. we'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Fried Chicken" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: Took my daughter and her friends here for her 12th birthday party today! They were totally pumped to experience the “Fried Chicken” room! They had a blast, and “almost” escaped, lol! The staff was awesome and all the rooms offered at 21 Keys looked both challenging and fun! We will definitely be visiting them again! Thanks for making her day special!!

room_title: Escape room "Fried Chicken" by 21 Keys Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: My husband and I love doing our date nights at escape rooms and tonight we had a blast doing fried chicken!! We were a little rusty and got frustrated but it was fun ! We will be back next month to try an conquer the speakeasy!!!
